Activity: Log in, grab a coffee, and quickly scan emails. Filter out anything urgent.

Start researching SEC regulations related to fund accounting and reporting for UHNWI-focused funds. Focus on Form PF, Form ADV, and relevant Investment Company Act rules.  Prioritize understanding the requirements for market-neutral statistical arbitrage funds.
Take a break. Check financial news headlines on Bloomberg. Gotta stay sharp on the market.
Continue SEC regulation research. Specifically look for clauses related to valuation of assets, expense allocation, and investor reporting frequency.
Lunch. Grab a burger and catch up on sports scores.
Resume research. Focus on audit requirements for SEC-registered funds. Identify key audit areas and potential challenges.

Draft an email to @audit-1 (External Auditor) outlining our plan to register the fund and asking for an initial consultation to discuss audit expectations and potential pitfalls. @comp-1 (Compliance Officer) should be included in this email. Topic: Initial Consultation Request - SEC Registered Fund Audit.

Begin drafting a preliminary framework for tracking fund performance. Think about the key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to statistical arbitrage strategies (Sharpe Ratio, Sortino Ratio, Information Ratio, etc.).
Review the framework draft and identify areas for improvement. Check personal finance websites for new investment strategies.
